rounds.name: First Round
rounds.description: Company sent a link of website called test.gclocked.com, the platform was like google form. There were total 65 questions with no negative marking. They divided MCQ into six sections as number series and find the missing number and pattern, basic web development, Java classes, testing, basic networking questions and I don't remember the last one sorry for that. Each section had minimum four to maximum eight questions.
rounds.focused: Problem solving, basic concept of web development, Java classes, testing and basic networking such as SSL etc.

rounds.name: Second Round
rounds.description: This round was held on Team, there were two peoples. They asked me to introduce yourself then they were asking about my Intership projects. Questions on the Intership and the academics projects. As I had mentioned Python3.X in my resume they asked me to write Count Characters from a string in Python3.X it is basic question they allow me share screen and I wrote code for the same, later they asked me to consider input string as case insensitive(treat lowercase and uppercase alphabets as same) I made one line change and they impressed. Later they asked about for what purpose I used make in my project I explained. As I mentioned MongoDB in my project they asked me difference between SQL and NoSQL, why did I used MongoDB in my project I explaned. As I also mentioned socket programming they asked me about what is socket and give me example where is socket as end user perspective I told them aboout the Netflix and how it work, they satisfied. Then they asked me about join in SQL I told them types of join. Later they gave me two tables as employee(emp_id, ename) and dept(dname, emp_id) and asked me two queries, 1) write query to diplay employee name along with it's department name 2) Display how many employees in each department, I wrote both queries they impressed. This round is held for 40mins and from 17 students 7 of us get qualified to the third round.
rounds.focused: Mentioned projects in the resume, SQL queries

rounds.name: Third Round
rounds.description: This round was held on Team, there were two peoples and HR and CTO of the company. Both of them was very cool. They asked me how was lockdown period for you and how and what you did during that period. Later CTO was asking about intership project. Then they asked about what's your next 5yrs plan then next 10yrs plan. Then they asked me to give approach on building big, complex, highly scalable project I gave my approach. This round is held for near about 15-18mins. From 7 students 4 got final offer, I wasn't one of them.
rounds.focused: How you can handle situations, your approach of thinking
